content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dogs out on the porch when i noticed an extremely large white oddly shaped aircraft above the trees across the street. the blinking lights first caught my attention. i immediately thought it was a u.F.O. it was flying from the north to south at a steady pace. i called for everyone inside to hurry outside to see what they thought it was. we lost sight of it when it appeared to make a left hand turn and started descending. 

it was an extra large, white, silent, aircraft with huge triangular vertical wings(?) on top with intermittent flashing blue lights and red lights on bottom.
content.summary: Quick sighting outside of house

content.detailedDescription: About 9:15 pm (mountian time) i was sitting on the front porch of our house which is on a hill. i was looking east over town of tucumcari,nm. there was a bright flash of light and when i looked up about 35 degrees from the horizon there were two lights, exactly like the bright headlights of a car. they seemed to be shining directly toward me. there was no sound. they did not move at all for about 15-20 seconds. then they seemed to turn ever so slightly to their right and then just disappeared. i mean vanished or turned off. they were not seen again. our house is directly west of a very small airport, about 7 miles. we see the small planes all the time as they land and take off coming directly over our house. these planes are usually at about 2 to 4 thousand feet high. my first thought was that it had to be one of the planes that had taken off, for whatever reason had landing lights, on and must have gone behind a cloud. it was headed away from the airport not toward it.. also,these small planes do not have two landing lights. looking carefully i could see no clouds. not understanding what i had seen i called to my husband to come out and told him what had happened.  we looked for any sign of clouds and saw none. there were many stars. after thinking about this for some time we are still mystified. any thoughts?
content.summary: Unidentified lights

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what the sphere is, but it's obvious in the attached picture. i wasn't trying to capture anything with my phone but the truck beside me to send a pic to my gf...And no, i didn't see it until i saw the blown up version at home.
content.summary: Driving on i5 southbound and snapped a picture of a truck

content.detailedDescription: Two tall thin black beings with a square shaped head. no visible arms. standing by neighbors car in the street. standing still.  my 6 year old daughter went to get a glass of water from the kitchen at 2 a.M and the blinds were open. she looked outside and saw them standing by a car..They were not moving. she came in our room crying and my husband went to go see what she saw. nothing was there when he looked and my daughter told me it was gone. she said the creatures looked like halloween creatures. this happened in stansbury park utah
content.summary: A tall thin black being

content.detailedDescription:
Location: tyler, tx, corner of bow and spring, lasseters grocery parking lot.  time of day: 6 pm or so, near sunset.  date, late spring/early summer.

mom parked the car and ran into the grocery store to pick something up for dinner.  i rolled down the car window and sat on the door facing west.  my brother and sister were fighting in the back seat.  i was sitting on the door to catch a breeze, but there wasn't any.

i caught a movement to the north out of the corner of my eye.  it was a disc shaped object moving in s southerly direction.  it crossed bow st, over the church at the corner across from the parking lot and hovered over the concrete water tower.  it was getting darker and it seemed to glow a red-orange, not like a sunset, like it was hot.  it hovered there for about 5-6 minutes.  then took off like a bullet to the south, passing over the peoples bank building.  

altitude: i think about 500 feet.  it was totally silent.  no wind, or sound.  size about the diameter of the water tower.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came in out of the north, hovered over water tower

content.detailedDescription: I was with some friends, we were hanging out at her house on the lake, by ranier, mn and all of a sudden this object appeared. it hovered for about 2-3 mins and then gone. didn't hear any sounds as it was super quiet. we all just were in shock and a bit freaked out... but amazed that it was so close. i happened to have my phone and was quick to snap just one picture. it seemed like it was almost right over the top of us... and it moved some but not much. it turned in a circle motion as it went up into never never land.  this is not the first time i have seen this around this area, but this is the first time i was able to get a picture and the first time it was so close. my first sighting of this was further up the lake, on rainy lake. i also know of others that have seen them around here as well, but all stories i have ever heard, they have spotted them on the lake.
content.summary: Out of no where this object just appeared

content.detailedDescription: Jet?I don't think so.....
content.summary: Strange object shown reflect on window

content.detailedDescription:
Was leaving a friends house around 10:30pmcst, and before i got into my vehicle, i noticed some flashing lights in the sky.  not bright by any means, but if you were looking at the approaching lightning, you could notice them easily.  didn't really think too much of them and began my drive home.  upon turning onto my street, i slowed down and looked out my window to the east.  i saw that there were now three lights in total.  they were not blinking in unison.  as i watched the lights, they began to move together into the shape of a triangle.  they kept moving at each other until it appears as though they met and spun around as one unit then dashed away from the point of rotation.  i called the friend, whose house i had just left to see if he could see  said objects.  after describing where they were he could see the two that i could also see.  one went off to the east and i lost sight of it in a minute or two.  the second two were off to the west well over minnesota (extremely close to the boarder), and one was towards the south end of town.  i watched them until they dipped behind my neighbors house and could no longer see them.  

the total duration of my sighing was approx. 5 min.  from the point of initially turning down my street and seeing them, to calling the friend, to watching them drift off.  the trip home took around 7-10 min, and i believe that they were over the area the entire time.
content.summary: Saw 3 flashing lights come together and form a trangle, then shoot apart.

content.detailedDescription:
A group of us (14 people) were visiting the kansas city area and had just visited the liberty memorial near downtown kansas city at night to see the views of the city. as we were leaving and walking down long entrance to the memorial we noticed two lights at approximately 2000 feet of altitude coming from due south of the liberty memorial headed to the north. as the two ���lights��� came closer to us i said to one of my friends,���hey look at the helicopters flying in formation���. the entire group began looking at the ���helicopters���. as the two approached we could see that they were different. one was no doubt a helicopter. it was easily identifiable. it was also now apparent that the helicopter was chasing or engaging the other object in what looked to be an inquisitive posture. it really looked like the helicopter was trying to figure out what the heck this thing was. my description of this ���craft��� would be orangish/yellowish/goldish��� also like a small sun���.. or for lack of a better word, orb. if i had to narrow it down to one color it would be orangish���. it was obviously spherical in shape. the colors were not from multiple lights, but more like entire craft was glowing. it had no blinking lights like normal aircraft. the only sound that could be heard was from the helicopter.(single helicopter blade sounds)

as they reach the air space just above our heads the helicopter appeared to swing around to get a better look. the object changed directions slightly to the northwest and the helicopter seemed to back off quickly, then continued to trail the object. at approximately a mile from our location it appeared the helicopter backed off more and a plane (with blinking lights) appeared to flyby. at this point the object seemed to speed up and leave the area at a much quicker speed.  

i���m 48 years old and i can honestly say i have no clue what this ���craft��� could have been, i have never seen anything that would even come close to this craft in appearance. it was obviously controlled and it had obviously gained the attention of what appeared to be a police helicopter. 

i could upload a image, but it is only lines of color. i had been taking long exposure images of the monument (night/dark photography)and turned to snap a shot and still had the camera set at several second exposure time.. it does however show the change of direction and small dounble line for the helicopter. (front light and tail light)
content.summary: Orangish orb chased by helicopter over kansas city, mo

content.detailedDescription: I was at my pool with my family, one of our family member caglar suggested us to turn off the lights so we could watch the starts. i am glad he did it because after 30 minutes passed i saw one moving star-like object, i thought it was an airplane so i made a joke with my family and told them to look at the sky to see ufo, we all look up to sky and  every one of us saw that the object moved from south to north and  lost the shiny light slowly and disappeared. we were trying to find out what it was, 30 second later we heard rumbling noise from the clear sky. we thought atlantis might be ready to land in but when i checked the nasa webpage i learn that it is schedule to be land on thursday. i checked all the other news to see if anyone noticed this strange object and rumbling noise, i couldn't find anything. if it wasn't the rumbling noise or 15 second of sighting i would say it could be either meteor or falling star, but i don't think any of them could make that noticeable rumbling noise.
content.summary: Shine like a star and moved 10 seconds and disappeared slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures in my back yard of the sun. it was 5:30 pm so i was taking pictures toward the west. while i was taking pictures of the sun, i noticed a small object to my left, that was flying around erratically, very unlike an airplane. it also moved very quickly. darting about this way and that. even though i first spotted the object to my left, it seemed that the object was moving more or less in the vicinity of the sun. i didn't think that i would be able to capture a picture of it since it was moving around so fast, but decided to continue taking pictures in the general direction of the area in which the object was moving, which was the vicinity of the sun. i don't have any kind of fast-picture taking ability with this camera and was not optimistic that i would actually be able to capture the object, however, after downloading my pictures i noticed that the object does appear in one of the pictures that i took. looking at the object in the picture, zooming in a little on it, i can see that very distinctive, almost clich���d saucer shape, the same shape that i recognized when i saw the object in real time. i again, did not think it was airplane. i also didn't think it was a bird not only because of its very distinctive saucer shape, but it also appears to be metallic and it was moving around in a very erratic and very high rate of speed. while i was observing the craft, i could also make out that the craft was rotating (i believe counter-clockwise) and i don't know if its my imagination but i think the rotation can actually be discerned from the photograph. maybe it only seems that way to me since i actually saw the craft rotating in real time. i wish i had had my camera set to a higher resolution. the picture was taken with an olympus fe 14 mega-pixel camera. it was set to auto shutter-speed and auto aperture. i didn't have the camera set on 14 mega-pixels, but approximately 8 mega pixels, so that i could use the fine zoom on the camera which is an optical zoom only and does not use a digital zoom. this produces less artifacts in the photograph, which suited my purpose for taking photographs of the sun. at the time that i observed the object i was quite excited, since it appeared to be a flying saucer, it was quite exciting. i only hoped i would be able to get a picture of it, which i wasn't too optimistic. i lost sight of the object after about two minutes when it went zipping away, at a very high rate of speed. i tried to attach the picture and it said it was infected with a virus. that's impossible. i went right from my camera on to my computer. i used photo editor to crop the photo, and will try again to attach the photo.
content.summary: Was taking pictures of the sun when flying saucer appears into view

content.detailedDescription:
Awoke at 4:30, 30 minutes before my alarm clock was to go off to get up, and left my dogs out as i do every morning.  decided to get into the hot tub, and noticed 4 lights in a square or diamond shape.  it was right before sunrise, approximate altitude was 1 mile above.  object traveled in a straight line traveling in west direction from york towards gettysburg.  object disappeared into some clouds.  there was no sound what so ever.

                           * this light was blinking white then orange/yellow

          *                              *this light was blinking white then orange/yellow

                           *these two lights were steady orange/yellow lights
content.summary: 4 lights, shape of a diamond,

content.detailedDescription:
On a similar matter, as long as i'm writing anyway, i may as well report that i also saw (personally) a ufo.  i never reported it because i was the only one in my group who saw it, as they were all looking elsewhere.  but it wasn't a case of mistaking it for "bright lights in the sky."  in my case the gigantic, triangular craft gently, quietly floated over our car while we were driving on i-10.  and it wasn't super high in the sky either -- maybe 100 yards (although i'm bad at estimating distances).  my husband was driving west on i-10, naturally looking straight ahead.  i had turned my body around sideways facing him so i could speak to him and also speak with the two people in the back seat.  then i saw a huge triangular ufo slowly glide over the car, and when i turned to look out my side window i saw it glide down behind a small hill on my side of the car.  it had a light on each of it's three points.  it was such an amazing experience that i never even mentioned it to anyone in the car until 3 months later, as i felt that it was meant for me alone to see.  also, since no one else saw it and there would be no proof, i didn't see the point in reporting it.  this took place in, i think, september of 1994.  i guess it made me feel special to have witnessed the craft when no one else did, so i didn't say anything for awhile.  in any event, now is as good a time as any to mention it to mufon, since i'm writing to you anyway about the travel channel program.

thank you for your time.
content.summary: Two different stories.  see below please.

content.detailedDescription:
Sence 09 been seeing them so iv been serching sence.What i found is that they are everwear iv found there is a pattern that you look for in the brush or rock formation . by seeing a 4 finger the 5th a 1/2 half finger the same as the five fingers on the human hand. once i find that sine then it opens the door way to the demention to ther relm to were ther everywere .Tomarrow i am going to be annellised with behaveral helth in ventera county. to see if im crazy or not but i know im not i know what i see is real
were was i] all over the mountians of ojai,matilija canyon,hiway 33 in the mountians. lockwood valley rd 8n12 mile marker                             .[what was i doing at the time] iv been serching form them all the time.[why i frist notice them]digging for gold in lockwood valley in the year of 2009 been seeing them sence then         ..[they teach me all the time i am always learning. i dont understand why i am the one to know them and not anyone eles i realy need help in the matter please.
content.summary: Been seeing ufos all over ojai valley in the foothills and deep into the mountians

content.detailedDescription:
This detailed description is being generated by john royer for walter lilly who has no computer.

walter is seventy years old and sounds credible. his nickname is buddy. he came out of his garage which faces east and immediately saw a formation of 5 or 7 lights that were off-white to light yellow in color. he said this was in early fall because the leaves were off the trees so i assumed the month was october. he was startled and amazed. he said it seemed like he was looking at a formation of aircraft or something really strange. he said if you take your hand and look at it edgewise and tilt it just a little bit you will get the impression that he got. he said he first saw them at about 30��� of altitude. i asked him if his head was tilted up a little bit like maybe 30��� and he said that that sounds good. he said the lights were proceeding west. he said they were going rapidly. he went through his garage to look through the west window and the lights were gone. he stated that he was carrying some firewood when he saw the lights. he also stated that he has a friend who was driving somewhere and saw an orange ball of light descend into the woods. he said his friend noticed that other cars were pulled over and the occupants were looking at the orange light. i asked walter to see if his friend would also make a report. walter seemed very nervous when he talked and mentioned that his wife was concerned about getting phone calls from screwballs. i assured him that his information would be accessible only to us and not to the general public. he had a very likable affect, a little bit dutchy. since i took this report, i recommend getting someone else to make the official telephone call.

report ends.
content.summary: Walter came out of his garage and saw lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I keep my dining room curtains open full from the point where the sun starts to set, until i go to bed so i can keep an eye on the night sky. i was walking past the window at 2101 (i had just looked at the clock), and saw a black helicopter chasing what appeared to be a red-orange orb. the orb was moving fast and erratically. it appeared to me moving in a somewhat straight direct path with some maneuvers mixed in such as moving quickly up, down, and around. (like if a bouncy ball was trapped in a box) there was still enough day light to make out all the objects, and the mountain ranges. it looked to me as if it was playing "cat & mouse" with the chopper. as the chopper moved erratically (trying to chase it), they moved out of sight and that's when i noticed a huge black plane pacing the chopper. 

the whole event only lasted about 10 seconds. i grabbed my video camera as i ran out the front door, but by then, it was already in the tree line and i could not capture it on film. 

there was no wind, no clouds, or anything (except the trees) to interfere with this sighting.

this is exactly what happened a couple weeks ago above my place but in that instance, the orb was green.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Another orb being chased by helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
Around noon on the 23rd of december, 2011, i noticed yet more parallel vapor (or chemical) trails over my house. i took photos from my rear yard as well as from the rear deck of my home. it wasn't until i pulled the photos into photoshop to create a pano shot from several photos that i noticed a shiny object in one of the photos. i zoomed in on what appears to be a double sphere shaped object. may be a plane but it left no "vapor" trail like all the other planes did that day. if it was a plane, it makes me wonder why other aircraft were leaving miles-long trails. i do not know how long it was there and can not estimate altitude. it appears as though it is a similar altitude as the trails but have no way to know for sure.

for what it is worth, i don't get a lot of air traffic over my home and have a difficult time explaining 10's or 20's of vapor trails running perfectly parallel to each other.

i am including the original shot which contained the ufo as well as a zoom of the same shot.
content.summary: Ufo in what i believe to be chemtrails

content.detailedDescription:
I was up just north of cadilac mi. on a friends property. that morning i noticed that the sun had a pair of "sun dogs" (partial rainbow that appear on either side of the sun) and a slight halo around it. both are natural occurances. i took three pictures one right after another trying to capture the sun dogs. you can see one of the sun dogs in the left hand side of the pictures, and a hint of the halo around the sun. i took the pictures with my phone. once i took them i exited out of the camera part of the phone and put it away not noticing anything in two of the pictures. i did not see anything in the sky other than the sun dogs and halo caused by the type of clouds. the third picture is just the sun, so if you look at all three in sucesion you'll notice that the object has moved across the sky relative to the sun. according to the time stamp on my phone the object moved from left (east) to right (west)and the photo without the object is the final of the three.

i got home later that day and downloaded the pictures i took. that was when i noticed the sphere shaped object in two of the pictures. this sphere is surounded by a redish looking plasma type shape.

first thing i would like to state: is i do not think nor believe this is the mothership, or a spacecraft of alien nature. i really do not know what it is which is why i'm contacting you. they are very interesting pictures whatever it is. 

if you figure out what it is i would be grateful if you would contact me with an answer. or if you need more information about it you can contact me.
content.summary: Something wierd under the sun

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:05 p.M. on monday , july 18th ,2011. i was getting ready to leave my house to go to the gym and workout. i have a membership at the local 24hr fitness center. as i locked my front door and walked to my car, which was parked on the street and not in my drive way this day, a object in the sky caught my attention. it was, in the best way to describe it, looked like an ordinary star at first glance. there were a lot of stars out in the night sky this night, but the thing that stood out was that this star like object was moving across the sky and made no noise. then, that's when i noticed the second star like object, which was exactly the same size as the first object, same brightness and made no sound , but moving in a south- east direction. the first object that i saw was moving towards me in a northeast direction. i got the feeling that these two objects must have been flying close together and then split into different flight directions.Now i do want to point out that there are many commericial craft, private planes, and military craft that fly across the sky over my city. the thing is that, when they do, you can see a fixed wing object flying across the sky with sound following behind it. at night, when you see these man made craft, all their lights are visible. not to mention that i worked at an airport for a period of 4 years and have seen just about every plane, helicopter and experimental aircraft out there. also, living in san diego all my life, which has the navy, marines and national guard based in our city, you see f-16 and f-18 and just about every known military aircraft out there flying across the sky on a daily basis. going back to the two objects that i saw. these star like objects were moving at a steady speed, but not very fast. they were not shooting across the sky, but rather like coasting across the sky. i would say that they were about 5,000 to 8,000 ft in the sky. i tried to stay watching both of these objects, but the one moving southeast was getting to far away for me to stay watching it, so i focused on the first one that i saw. it was directly above me for about a few seconds. this might sound weird, but i got the feeling as if what or whoever was flying this craft, knew i was watching it. then, the object slowed down, almost like it was not moving and begun to flicker. it got bright and then dim. it did this for about 3 or 4 seconds, then stopped flickering and begun to speed up again. it kept moving in a northeast direction. i tried to glance at the second object to see if it was still visible in the sky, but it was long gone or just faded out of view. by the time i looked back in the first objects direction, it was gone and i could not see it anymore. this is not the first time i have seen similar objects. i have seen these same star like objects about 5 times in the last 8-9 months. i have never see two of these objects at once though. i am not a person that is trying to get attention. i am just an average 28 year old man who likes his sports and hanging out with my friends. i believe what i am seeing is not any know man made aircraft in the sky. again, the best way to describe these objects, is to go outside and pick one of the brightness stars in the sky. same size as a star would look, and the same altitude a star would appear to be to the naked eye, and picture that star moving across the sky at a steady speed. this is the best description i can give about what i am seeing. i observed these two star like objects for about 50 to 70 seconds.
content.summary: I saw two star like objects in the night sky. one was moving ne in the sky, the other se in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch in melrose fl and as i looked to the left of me (252 west cardinal direction) i could see a stationary star but realized it was flashing colors of red, green and white at no paticular pattern. i called my brother out who is an expert in anything military or aircraft based. we discussed the facts that no earth aircraft in our region could be stationary like it was for as long as it was. we figured maybe it could be a reflection on something, so we returned inside dissapointed. after around 45 mins, i looked back outside and it had moved lower and towards the north, so now we knew it wasnt any stationary object being reflected upon. i was so extatic to finally and officialy notice a ufo. after a few moments, it slowing dissappeard below the treeline of our sight. it wasnt above us or very close, but was very bright which is why we thought it could be a star until it moved. for the distance, the brightness of the lights could not have been any earth aircraft. after the sighting i immediately wrote this report.
content.summary: Star-like circle that was stationary for at least 45 mins while flashing red, green, and white.

content.detailedDescription: just before 9:30pm my wife and i took our puppy out to the back yard for his night time bathroom break. we live in the country so sky watching is just something we like to do. while waiting i noticed a silvery light moving fast across the east horizon line. the speed of it caught my attention. i pointed it out to my wife  and then we notice 3 more as we began to look around. they were almost directly above us. the 3 were moving towards each other when we noticed them. one was moving some what straight from a southernly direction to a northern direction. one that looked like it was coming from the northern direction was moving erratically (like jumping from spot to spot. it was also more bright than the others) but mostly head southernly towards the one coming from the south. the third just kind of appeared out out no where and seemed to be coming from the west. all 3 looked like they were going to collide. my wife got excited because she thought they were going to crash! but it looked more like they passed right through each other. after crossing paths or whatever they did, the one headed more northernly seem to pick up speed very fast and quickly disappeared into the north direction. the brighter one from the north was still headed southernly but slowed and stopped for about 1 min. the one that came in from the west instantly turned 90 degrees northernly (but was more n/w in direction) at the point of meeting for the three. it kept the same speed the entire time. it wasn't fast, but it wasn't slow! we watched it till it faded off into the sky. the brighter one that stopped, just disappeared where it was. it looked bigger too compared to the other ones and most of the stars that are in the sky. the other two seemed to be about the same size and brightness. i would size them comparable with the majority of the small stars in the sky. big enough to see, but too small to see any detail. not like you would see if it were an airplane, you can see it's flashing lights. can only say they looked like white lights just like most stars look like, other than they were moving.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 4 lights. noticed one moving along the east horizon. then notice 3 above us moving towards each other. moved through or past each other headed in dif. directions.

content.detailedDescription: I live in the outskirts of salem in farm land and there is almost no light penetration from the city so the sky is unbelievably clear. i have seen explainable things in the sky every night for almost 2 and a half months. my first sighting was over an onion field at around 9:30pm so the sun had set but the sky was still in a twilight state and i saw a bright white light hovering which seemed to be hovering about 300ft off the ground. as i was staring at it it blinked twice and then went out completely and just vanished. i heard no noise. the whole sighting lasted about 30 seconds from the time i noticed the light from the time it disappeared. i started watching the sky at night since then and ive seen bizarre things every night and not just one sighting a night multiple sightings of different kings of objects and different colors. last week i saw a formation 3 bright red flashing lights that were silent and only red no other exterior lights and they went one by one in the same direction fallowing the first. one would almost disappear from view then the next would appear. the same night i saw 4 orange solid lights blink into existence over a different area and disappear within a 10 minute period. they flew over a hazelnut orchard and looked like they would speed up then slow down then speed up again and they flew like that till they disappeared. i could go on and on. the most frequent craft i see are amber colored and seem to flash hints of other colors like blue and white almost as if it were like a ball of fire and i can see them hover for hours and the whole time they bob up and down and sway back and forth ascending and descending as they very very slowly make their way across the sky almost as if it was observing the ground. im not sure why im not hearing anything about ufo sightings in salem oregon but i suggest someone looks into it because the amount of activity here is phenomenal i am trying desperately to get my hands on a good video camera to get some footage. maybe some investigators should look into making a trip to see some oregon lights it would be so worth it!
content.summary: It was amber with the naked eye and seemed to faintly flash colors like blue and white

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Well i've contacted mufon about this before and one man was very rude to me and i talked to a older couple through skype and they said my story was the kind they like to investigate and was told they would contact me but i never heard back from them,starting to think mufon is a joke. if you are interested in seeing these unidenified objects that are not aircraft of earth. i can show them to you any clear night. i have seen them that looked like they are in space and i have seen them as low as 800-1000 feet above the ground. they give off no sound and are hard to spot if you don't know what to look for,even if you do spot them,most just figure them to be airplanes but if you watch them for as long as i have you will see some strange things happen. i do not beleive them to be satalites or aircraft of known orgin. i have watched them in n west tx,florida,east tx, oklahoma where i am at this time. i call them my friends as i know they know i am seeing them. i took a maglight flashlight one night and i flashed the light at them in a fast flash. i believe one night they acknoledged me as it flashed back at me with approx. 8-10 flashes and it was moving away from me when it flashed back at me. i know in my heart these are not from earth. you have my contact info so if interested in investigating them contact me. i have showed them to a few friends and they were at awwww. this is not a joke. thank you.
content.summary: I've been watching these since 1993 and still seeing them to todays date

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my balcony getting ready to take pictures of an approaching thunderstorm when i saw this in the sky ( see picture) it was moving slowly horizontally paused for about 3 minutes or so and continued. it made no noise and had no noticeable flashing lights like that of an airplane or any suggestion of flapping like a bird. i felt calm, i wanted to shout for my boyfriend to come and look but i was afraid it would be gone or he would think im silly, so i took a picture. i also saw multiple orbs of light but because of the coming thunderstorm i took them for ball lightning.
content.summary: Strange something over city

content.detailedDescription: On july 5, 2011  around 5:15 pm. i was calibrating my carburetor from my car and my wife was helping me by putting it in gear and holding the brakes.  while my wife was in the car she was looking at the sky and started to see a black sphere and called me to come from in front of the car and to look up,  when i looked up i see a black sphere and i'm telling my son to go and get his binoculars and when he came back he said he can't find them so he brought his sister's i-pod touch and i started to take pictures.   i then started to take video but i was having trouble seeing the sphere on the i-pod so i pointed the i-pod to were it was the last time i saw it and started to record.  we saw the black sphere for about seven to nine minutes it moved sideways, up, down, and would also stay in place for a minute and take off.  after it disappeared we heard in the back round military jets going to were the black sphere were. i came inside my house and started to see the pictures and the videos put the screen was to small to see anything so i downloaded it to my computer and started to darken the color of the pictures to see it better and i started to see white spheres on the pictures so i started to see the videos that i took and the same thing the white spheres were there too.  then i converted the three minute video to one hour and twenty minutes and also adjusted the lighting and when i played it back it shocked me and scared me because the white spheres where going in and out of the clouds and some even left a trail when they came out from the clouds.    they are different sizes and they are more than thirty or forty spheres and they move so fast and if you go frame by frame you can see them going in and out and some stop and you can see that they are white round spheres. i was in shock how many they are and how fast they move and also how they used the cloud to hide and to me they manipulated the clouds shape so they could move to another place.  since that day i feel confused and also have a hard time concentrating or focusing on things i feel lost and the more i see the videos the more start to wonder why so many of them? and what were they doing or looking for?  i wish i could talk to some one about it but i'm scared i don't want to talk to just anyone.  if you would be interested on the videos i have it on my computer and still have the originals on the i-pod and if you would like to get a hold of me write me an e-mail and give me a number were i can call, because i really want to talk to some one who has experience on this type of sightings. i sent you the original video and the one in slow motion.  this happened in san jacinto california.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: One black sphere and 30 or 40 white spheres

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 3:30 am to our 2 and half yr old son waking up in his room. not very unusual but becoming less frequent as he gets older. i waited a few minutes to see if he'd simply go back to sleep on his own but he continued to call out my name calmly. before going in his room i went out to living room of our apartment to fold out the futon couch for us to rest on. i set up a few pillows and blankets but before going back to his room i decided to open the sliding glass door a bit to let the cool night air in. while i was doing this i also decided to look up at the night sky. i was facing due east when i noticed just above the next apartment roof-line a normal sized looking star. it was stationary and i made the guess that it was a star or an airplane heading toward my direction (westward). after 5-10 seconds of a stationary position it slowly started to move straight up. i then ruled out it being a star and settled on it being a plane. it moved up approximately 5-10 degrees then completely stopped. remained stationary for approximately 3-5 seconds then descended back down toward the horizon but not in a straight line. it was wiggling down or following a curving "s" shape path down until it was out of view because of the facing apartment building roof top. the color of the light appeared to be a dull red.

additionally, later that morning when i was walking out the door i kissed my wife goodbye and my son. he looked up at me and said, ���orion see big spaceship in the sky. big spaceship in sky���. our jaws dropped. the last time he woke up in the middle of the night (approx late june), and coincidentally it was the same time 3:45 am. the next morning he said the same thing to my wife careen, ���orion see spaceship high in the sky���. in my report here, i���m paraphrasing but careen wrote down what he said that morning for a more precise reference to his own words.
content.summary: Star like object rose above roof line and then swiveled back toward horizon

content.detailedDescription:
As called in to asd on 7-18-2011 by one of the witnesses: 

i was with five other adults visiting the liberty memorialin kansas city, missouri on saturday night july 16.  as we were walking down the steps to leave, i noticed a strange gold ball of light flying n.W. to s.E.  the size of it was smaller than the full moon.  it was a bright gold color and was perfectly round. the light did not pulse or waver, and there were no blinking lights on it like you would expect from a conventional aircraft.  the helicopter made circles around the object it as it moved along.  the object moved at different hights and inconsistent speeds, and we thought it was going to crash due to the angle it was headed down (45 degrees) but it did not.  it changed size, probably based on moving further away and closer to us. it turned completely white then just dissapeared in front of our eyes. we heard the helicopter noise but nothing else, as if there was no other craft in the area. after the object dissapeared a plane came in the area, but we did not pay much attention to it so i don't know what type of plane it was.  one of the men with us got some pictures of the object and helicopter. i would like to know if anyone else saw this object.  

note from fi: i am attempting to get a copy of the photos.
content.summary: Gold ufo chased by helicopter near liberty memorial in kansas city

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting is reported on cms by investigator beverly trout, as reported to iowa mufon by the reporting witness.

on saturday night, july 2, 2011, at about 9:40 p.M., reporting witness saw an orange, glowing object for an estimated 25 seconds, which looked angular on one side (see sketch attached), at about 60 degrees up as she drove e on an e-w street in her town of approx. 9,500 population.  the next night her daughter-in-law contacted her to say that several family members who'd gotten together on sunday night, 7-3-11, discovered that they'd all seen something from their various locations in surrounding communities the night before for several minutes, but the daughter-in-law reported that what they saw was white, not orange and glowing, as seen by this reporting witness.  also, their sightings were at 9:30 p.M., which appears to indeed match the passage of the international space station (iss) as seen from that area, but does not explain what was seen by this reporting witness.  witness lost sight of object because of surrounding vegetation.  after arriving home, she now thinks it's odd that she forgot about it until the next night when her daughter-in-law texted her re the various family members having seen something from various locations in surrounding communities.  (investigator note:  reporting witness' "forgetting" the incident until the next night is what is known in ufo research as an inappropriate response in the presence of high strangeness.)
content.summary: Orange, glowing, silent object at 60 degrees ne of witness, headed from n to s, seen transiting 40+ degrees in approx. 25 seconds

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting in his backyard in a couple of lawn chairs just chatting and star-gazing when he says "hey there's a satellite!" i looked up and clearly saw a very high altitude light moving from sw to the ne over nevada, texas on july 17, 2011 at about 11:20pm. the object moved at about the speed you see from a satellite moving across the night sky so at first it wasn't unusual. then suddenly the object stopped and never moved again. it just sat there like a star. we watched and waited to see if it moved again and it never did. since we both had to work in the morning we finally just gave up waiting after about 30 minutes. i know its not the smoking gun the ufo enthusiasts are looking for but it is a factual description of exactly what we saw and it was certainly unusual.
content.summary: Very high altitude light moving from sw to ne. thought it was a satellite until it just stopped. never moved again. looked like a star.

content.detailedDescription:
We had finished dinner with our daughter's family and began to head home on i 95 from sterling road. my son was driving, my wife was in the middle of the back seat and i was in the front passenger seat.
as we approached 595 my wife observed lights to the west. she told my son who nudged me and told me to look out the window. i / we observed about 9 - 12 dark orange /amber lights in the west roughly in the formation of the big dipper. the open end of the "cup" was facing north and the handle curved slightly towards the ground. i would guess at arm's length it was about 5" from top to bottom. my wife said there was no movement but due to overpasses my wife saw them from 595 to the davie blvd exit. i only saw them for about 10 seconds. we pulled off i 95 at broward blvd to try to see them again but they were gone. 
they appeared to be a reasonable distant west of i 95 but the proximity to the fort lauderdale airport and the flight path from the west made it seem as though there would have been some observation from airport personal.
content.summary: While driving north on i 95 my wife, son and myself briefly observed a group of dark orange lights in the west in the rough shape of the big dipper
